about_the_game:
Aquarion Skin

A lone Aquarion outpost in the Ritiki Marshlands lost contact when the Aquarion Empire sank beneath the waves long ago. Believing themselves to be the last of their kind, the forgotten outpost attempted to carry out the Aquarion mission - monitor their land-dwelling siblings from afar and step in if a large-scale conflict erupted. It's been centuries since then, and the outpost has developed quite differently from its parent empire, befriending the swampy fauna and adapting to their environment in new and interesting ways.

The Forgotten can befriend swampy fauna, build structures on the water, create giant squids, ride crocodiles, tame toads and swim effortlessly in their marshy terrain.

Dominate the marshlands, reclaim your birthright, and conquer the Square!

Tribe skins are basically costumes for the tribe that will change an entire tribe's aesthetic from the ground up! New clothes, new buildings, new music, and sometimes even new animals! The Skins are also visible in multiplayer mode and the AI opponents will also use the skins.

Note: This purely cosmetic Forgotten Aquarion Skin does not have any gameplay changes from the normal Aquarion Special Tribe, which must be purchased separately in order to be used.
